mapper.select: select c.cartseq, c.memberseq, c.bookseq, b.title, b.writer, b.price, b.image from cart c inner join member m on c.memberseq = m.memberseq inner join book b on c.bookseq = b.bookseq where c.memberseq = #{memberseq}
mapper.delete: delete from cart where memberseq = #{memberseq} and bookseq = #{bookseq}
